Now we'll see Jesus heal a certain nobleman's son. He had no hope until he met Jesus. Just like all of us!

So Jesus came again to Cana of Galilee where He had made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman whose son was sick at Capernaum. 
He knew Jesus was the healer!

6. CAPERNAUM (2018) | Dir. Nadine Labaki

A heartbreaking slice of social realism, this powerful & provocative Lebanese drama paints a gut-wrenching portrait of poverty, neglect, child abuse, desperation & refugee crisis and also features last decade's greatest child performance. https://t.co/OKCRISVCIg
